translations: 男皮条客；<澳新，非正式>告发者，告密者
拉皮条；<非正式>使（某物）更炫（或更令人难忘）；<非正式>盛大（或持续）推售（某事物）；<澳新，非正式>告发，告密（pimp on）

sentences.sentence: Your pimp encourages drinking and you become addicted to drugs to ease the pain of it all.
sentences.translation: 你老板鼓励喝酒，而你药物上瘾，只是为了减轻痛苦。

sentences.sentence: One of the girls she rescued from a pimp later graduated from high school as valedictorian.
sentences.translation: 其中一个她所救的女孩之后在高中毕业典礼上致辞。

sentences.sentence: After the documentary American Pimp, they sent Johnny Depp in pursuit of Jack the Ripper in the 2001 From Hell, based on an Alan Moore graphic novel.
sentences.translation: 在拍摄完纪录片《美国皮条客》后，他们找来强尼·戴普在2001年拍摄的《来自地狱》中扮演开膛手杰克，这部电影基于艾伦·摩尔的漫画小说。
